name: High Ground Sports Bike City
description:
High Ground Sports Bike City is a motorcycle optimized for speed, acceleration, braking and cornering on paved roads, typicaly at the expense of comfort and fuel economy by comparison with other motorcycle. .Drift your racer sports bike with fast speed and drive away from the police or they will arrest you. Drive your sports car to race high speed on the roads to avoid getting caught. Otherwise you will end up in prison.
FEATURES
Realistic Motorbike Physics.
Great Collection of Latest Motorbikes.
High Definition Graphics.
Multiple Camera Views.
